msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Rollback 23243.  If comment followed header it was stripped as well.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
In frameworks, remove Adobe headers from all files except xml/mxml file types.  There are also a few .txt files that are license files that I didn't touch yet.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

When orientation changes, give Callout's resize handler a higher priority so that explicit sizes are removed before the soft keyboard effect is updated. Fixed issue where resize handlers were also interfering with explicit size because they were not uninstalled when the pop-up was closed.
SDK-31857 SPUC SK Effects : Callout upside down when keyboard active and orientation changed
Tests run: checkintests, SK effects cyclone w/ Lavanya
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Restore start values on pop-up after soft keyboard is deactivated due to pop-up closing or orientation change. Fix logic for capturing start values before blocking external changes to start values. Simplify soft keyboard effect state tracking.
SDK-31842 SPUC SK Effects [iOS] [Android] : SPUC does not resize on landscape
Tests run: checkintests, cyclone SK effects w/ Lavayna
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Snap pop-up size and position for keyboard height changes after the initial ACTIVATE. This prevents the SK effect from causing unwanted changes to soft keyboard height due to auto correction on Android.
Add null check during effect cleanup if pop-up was deactivate effect was aborted while the pop-up was closing.
SDK-31834 SPUC SK Effects: Resizing SPUC dismisses the suggestion panel on android
SDK-31843 SPUC SK Effects : RTE when closing a resized callout
Tests run: checkintests, manual SK effect tests
